fields.instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Mix ingredients in a large bowl. Add more bread crumbs if the mixture seems too loose.

Roll the meatballs about the size of a golf ball and place on baking sheet. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes.
fields.ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/2 lb. ground veal
4 large eggs
4 oz. dried bread crumbs
4 oz. whole milk
6 oz. grated Romano
3 oz. grated onion
2 oz. diced garlic
2 oz. finely diced Italian parsley
2 oz. finely chopped fresh basil
fields.intro: These are really great, tender meatballs. Katie had the suggestion to use 1/2 veal and 1/2 chuck and they turned out fabulous.
fields.title: Beef and Veal Meatballs
fields.endcomments: Enjoy with pasta or a simple marinara sauce.
